Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.code = ..AccessCode set proxy.name = ..Name set proxy.description = ..Description set proxy.mailSubject = ..MailSubject.Value set proxy.mailMessage = ..MailMessage.Value
&sql(SELECT COUNT(ID) INTO :proxy.itemsCount FROM Sti_Data.MailingItemApproved WHERE MGroup = :proxy.id)
quit proxy

Method.name: Save
Method.Implementation:
#dim group As MailingGroup = ""
do ##class(Sti.Utils.Log).Create(..%ClassName(1)_".Save", "ID="_data.id_ "; Name="_$ZCONVERT(data.name, "I","UTF8")_ "; Descr="_$ZCONVERT(data.description, "I","UTF8"))
if (data.id = ""){ set group = ..%New() set group.AccessCode = $SYSTEM.Util.CreateGUID() set group.MailSubject = ##class(Sti.Data.Localization.LText).Create($ZCONVERT(data.mailSubject, "I", "UTF8")) set group.MailMessage = ##class(Sti.Data.Localization.LText).Create($ZCONVERT(data.mailMessage, "I", "UTF8")) } else{ set group = ..%OpenId(data.id) set group.MailSubject.Value = $ZCONVERT(data.mailSubject, "I", "UTF8") set group.MailMessage.Value = $ZCONVERT(data.mailMessage, "I", "UTF8") }
set group.Name = $ZCVT(data.name, "I", "UTF8") set group.Description = $ZCVT(data.description, "I", "UTF8")
set st = group.%Save()
quit group

Method.name: Delete
Method.Implementation:
set group = ..%OpenId(grId, 4)
do ##class(Sti.Utils.Log).Create(..%ClassName(1)_".Delete", "ID="_grId_"; Name="_group.Name)
set st = ##class(Sti.Data.Localization.LText).Delete(group.MailSubject.%Id()) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = ##class(Sti.Data.Localization.LText).Delete(group.MailMessage.%Id()) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = ..%DeleteId(grId, 4) quit:$$$ISERR(st) ##class(Sti.Utils.Msg).GetErrorStatus("deleteMailingGroup", " | "_st)
quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetMailingItemsContacts
Method.Implementation:
set contacts = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New()
&sql(DECLARE MItemCur CURSOR FOR SELECT ID FROM Sti_Data.MailingItemApproved WHERE MGroup = :grId ORDER BY ItemFullName)
&sql(OPEN MItemCur) for { &sql(FETCH MItemCur INTO :id) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set itemObj = ##class(MailingItemApproved).%OpenId(id) set itemObjProxy = itemObj.ConvertToProxyObject($$$NO) set itemObjProxy.name = itemObj.ItemFullName do contacts.Insert(itemObjProxy) } &sql(CLOSE MItemCur)
quit contacts

Method.name: GetMail
Method.Implementation:
set group = ..%OpenId(grId)
set mail = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set mail.subject = group.MailSubject.Value set mail.message = group.MailMessage.Value
set mail.message = $REPLACE(mail.message, "%UnsubscribeUrl", "http://"_$get(^Settings("Sti","WebApp"))_"/sti/index.csp#/mailing/subscription/%AccessCode")
quit mail
